summary:
This mod will replace the moon with the amazing gas giant \"Polyphemus\" from Avatar movie! :D
To feel like an Na\'vi! xD
descriptionHtml:
-< P O L Y P H E M U S    P L A N E T    F R O M    A V A T A R >-
                                                                    by SalvoSoftware

[ UPDATES: ]

1.1 - Polyphemus has no rings.
     - High resolution textures.
     - \"Lunar\" phases ..

[ INFO: ]

- This mod will replace the moon with the gas giant \"Polyphemus\" from Avatar movie! :D

- The size of the planet \"Polyphemus\" is not realistic, so it seems farer then what it should be at realy.

- This mod will replace the moon with this new planet, so if you have another kind of moon installed this will replace it.

- I dont made \"masser Size x3.0\", the creator of that mod is akindain, but i put this mod on the zip because i think this two mods are perfect together.

[ INSTALL: ]

To install this Mod is very very simple, you have only to extract \"Polyphemus Planet From Avatar.zip\"  to your data directory.
To install masser Size x3.0 you have use the launcher, go to \"Data Files\" and toogle \"masser Size x3.0\", if Data Files is disabled you have to open SkirimPrefs.ini and set bEnableFileSelection=1.

Thanks for reading :D
author: SalvoSoftware
